title: Iphone makes game lag
body: Everytime someone uses the WiFi on an Iphone my game lags, usually when they are watching a video, instagram of facebook. i get 400ms or so. Yet if someone does this on a computer or an android nothing happens. They can even be watching 2 movies at a time from netflix, or everyone watching videos and photos from facebook, but the moment they do that on an iphone i canÂ´t even play. anyone has an idea of why is this happening? thanks

replies.body: This just happens with iphones, not any other portable device nor computers. This is why i asked to see if anyone knew a solution or why does this happen

Playing over wi-fi in general is likely to cause some packet loss, even major ones if you're using your phone's data.  Videos have an opportunity buffer and play, but League is happening in real-time.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look at your specific case, and find some options for you.
